name: Mystery Tales: The Twilight World Collector's Edition
description: A stay at a peaceful hotel turns into a nightmare when a witch from the Twilight World takes your daughter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1531 MB available space
